speaker: Creed
line: Oh God. Stuck with the weirdo.

title: Lice
speaker: Creed
line: I'm sorry, Pam. It looks a little messy.

title: Vandalism
speaker: Creed
line: Uh, 6783's also a good time. Less mileage.

title: Moving On
speaker: Creed
line: Hey Erin, look who's back. The bird man.

title: The Farm
speaker: Creed
line: $3.75 a cupcake, actually. $3.67 if you buy a dozen.

title: The Farm
speaker: Creed
line: I never forget a number. Names? In one ear and out the other. Places? Nope. Faces? That's rich. But, numbers? I have a gift. I guess that's why I'm an accountant.

title: Paper Airplane
speaker: Creed
line: Two grand huh? I know a guy who can turn that into eight hundred dollars. And it's me.

title: Livin' the Dream
speaker: Creed
line: I think just anybody could be a star. My postman, the night janitor here, but Andy? No, definitely not. Charisma black hole.

title: Livin' the Dream
speaker: Creed
line: Creed Bratton is the new manager!

title: A.A.R.M
speaker: Creed
line: Oh, I'm saving a fortune on dry cleaning.

title: A.A.R.M
speaker: Creed
line: This airs tonight? Oh my god. If my parents see this, I am toast.

title: A.A.R.M
speaker: Creed
line: Hey, grab a seat. We have that table and that table, but not that table or that table or that table. Floor's up for grabs. Meredith has been hogging the can.  Oh!

title: A.A.R.M
speaker: Creed
line: Ok, thirty seconds to showtime!

title: Finale
speaker: Creed
line: Jeff Bomondo. I sell ceramic tile out of Newark.

title: Finale
speaker: Creed
line: My wife's name is Kathryn. I can show you my social security card if it helps.

title: Finale
speaker: Creed
line: I saw a friend today. It had been a while. And we forgot each others names. But it didn't matter. �Cause deep inside the feeling still remained the same...

title: Finale
speaker: Creed
line: I still have my medal from that.

title: Finale
speaker: Creed
line: No, but I still have my medal from that.

title: Finale
speaker: Creed
line: And all the faces that I know have that same familiar glow. I think I must have known them somewhere once before.

title: Finale
speaker: Creed
line: It all seems so very arbitrary. I applied for a job at this company because they were hiring. I took a desk at the back because it was empty. But... no matter how you get there or where you end up, human beings have this miraculous gift to make that place home.  Let's do this.
